ðŸ“– Summary: reTermAI is a smart command assistant that recommends relevant terminal commands based on your shell history, leveraging AI models like OpenAI and Gemini. It offers intelligent matching by keyword or partial input and supports both zsh and bash shells. The tool is easily installed via pip and manages API keys through a .env file.
